::SnowCat::

She kept running.  She knew not why this bot was even trying to get 
her.  She had never delt with anything like this.  Since her arrival 
to this planet, she had always been in the mountains with other snow 
leopards.  She had never encountered anything like this bot who was 
chasing her.  She ran for all her worth.  She turned her head and 
shot back at the bot chasing her, but she senced that this wasn't a 
catch and release fight.  This was a fight to the death. She wasn't 
sure who was in the area or even if there were other bots like her on 
the planet.  She kept running in the hope of saving her skin.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Ok, c ya tomorrow, Logo.
> 
> ::DeathScythe::
> 
> The shot hits DeathScythe in his muscular shoulder, the bot 
> continuing to run. Jets emerge from the sides of his torso, sending 
> him flying through trees toward SnowCat.
